query: SELECT ml.id, r.name as region_name, r.code, ml.status, ml.products_found, ml.new_restocks, ml.created_at FROM monitoring_logs ml JOIN regions r ON ml.region_id = r.id WHERE ml.created_at > '2026-01-02 09:32:00' ORDER BY ml.created_at DESC LIMIT 3;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2LSjgciXE5U7gJN.root --database AE5tzfuADY2nWPRKhfHJC3 --execute SELECT ml.id, r.name as region_name, r.code, ml.status, ml.products_found, ml.new_restocks, ml.created_at FROM monitoring_logs ml JOIN regions r ON ml.region_id = r.id WHERE ml.created_at > '2026-01-02 09:32:00' ORDER BY ml.created_at DESC LIMIT 3;
